APPEARANCE.name: Akumu no Kuni no Cheshire Cat
Akumu no Kuni no March Rabbit

description:
http://anidb.net/ch25900 [Aichi] and his friends have won the National Tournament and decide to go their own ways until a mysterious boy named http://anidb.net/ch43391 [Tatsunagi Takuto] appears. He reveals that the Royal Paladins, Dark Paladins, and Kagero leaders have been captured, and the only way to free Cray is for the Vanguard fighters to use a new power- Limit Break. Because the Royal Paladins lose the ability to fight, Aichi`s deck is changed to be a Gold Paladin deck. Aichi and his friends must now win the Vanguard VF Circuit if they are to learn more about the occurrences on Cray and free their old friends.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Aichi plays against a mysterious boy with a new deck, Gold Paladin, and hears a story about the state of peril on the planet Cray!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 金色の騎士団(ゴールドパラディン)

REGULAR.description:
Aichi`s stuck with Gold Paladin, a deck he knows nothing about, and no one seems to remember his Royal Paladin deck. Aichi battles his last hope, Kai, in an attempt to jog his memory!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 発動!リミットブレイク!!

REGULAR.description:
Team Q4 has been invited to go to the Vanguard Fight Circuit, but who will the members be? Aichi and Misaki are on board, but Kamui has already joined Team Handsome! Is there any way Aichi can persuade Kamui to come back to Q4?!
Source: crunchyroll

Aichi goes with Misaki and Kamui to Card Shop PSY to ask the owners if they know anything about his suddenly-switched deck. Rekka, Kourin, and Suika are about to go on a trip, but Rekka finds time to taunt Team Q4 for letting their skills stagnate since the national tournament... and to prove it, Rekka debuts her Angel Feather deck as she takes on Misaki!
Source: crunchyroll

Team Q4 arrives in Singapore for the VF Circuit! While doing a little sightseeing, they run into old friends and meet potential new rivals. Then, Aichi happens to spot the boy who knows what happened to his Royal Paladin deck, but he`s not allowed to get anywhere near the kid!
Source: crunchyroll

The Vanguard Fight Circuit begins with Aichi, Kamui, and Misaki playing their matches simultaneously! Their first opponents: the world-traveling ninjas, Team Shinobi!
Source: crunchyroll

Kamui has won his match, so now it`s up to either Aichi, Misaki or both to best their ninja opponents, who are much more worldly than Team Q4. What effect will Aichi`s new card have on the match?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Lion That Exceeds Its Limits

REGULAR.description:
Team Q4 proceeds to the second round, where they fight against a team of fortune-tellers! Will Zeichiku spook Kamui with a curse? Will Misaki be thrown by the arrogant affection of Horoscope? And will Aichi be bested by an opponent who has a crystal ball on his head?!
Source: crunchyroll

It`s the third round of the Vanguard Fight Circuit, and Team Q4 is pitted against the Wunderkinder of Team SIT Genius, who not only have a natural aptitude for Vanguard, but were raised on it! Does Team Q4 stand a chance...?
Source: crunchyroll

Two of the matches between Team Q4 and Team SIT Genius are concluded, while the third is unexpectedly (and temporarily) interrupted by something that`s out of this world! Meanwhile, will Kamui`s love for Emi be broadcast worldwide?!
Source: crunchyroll

The power of Psyqualia is back, and this time Chris, the leader of Team SIT Genius, possesses it! Can Aichi beat this new rival with skill alone?!
Source: crunchyroll

Kai arrives in the Japanese Alps to do battle against the Abominable Snowman, who`s taken down one famous Vanguard challenger after another. But why does the Snowman seem to bear malice towards Kai before they even get started...?
Source: crunchyroll

Tetsu comes to Card Capital, but why? Is it just to challenge Team Q4 and anyone else who happens to be there? Or could his coming portend something more serious?
Source: crunchyroll

It`s the first match of the Seoul stage, but complicating matters for Team Q4 is the unique special rule in play for each match!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 熱狂のソウルステージ

REGULAR.description:
It`s Team Q4 versus New AL4, and the new member is Kai! Old rivalries are revisited, former teammmates are now opponents, and another mystical intervention occurs!
Source: crunchyroll

It`s Aichi`s first rematch with Ren since beating him at nationals, and the power of Psyqualia is back, too! Ren saw himself winning the match on the planet Cray. Will Aichi be able to keep the prophecy from coming true?!
Source: crunchyroll

Team Q4 has been defeated in the Seoul stage, but the final round is between New AL4 and Team Caesar. Will Kenji Mitsusada avenge himself after being thoroughly trounced by Ren at the national tournament in Japan?
Source: crunchyroll

Weird things always happen when Aichi and the gang visit PSY, and this time is no different. Legendary Cardfighter Daigo apparently appears out of nowhere with a long-lost Royal Paladin deck. Nasty newcomer Leon also makes his debut with Aqua Force, another legendary deck!
Source: crunchyroll

When Team Q4 arrives on a resort island to relax while they train, they discover it`s cohabited by New AL4! Is one island big enough for these two rival teams?!
Source: crunchyroll

On the resort island, Aichi struggles alone with how he should "move forward." Ren borrows another deck and uses it to fight Misaki. And when Kamui feels down after losing repeatedly to Tetsu, it`s Eiji and Reiji to the rescue!
Source: crunchyroll

For some reason, Mitsusada is looking for Aichi, who`s busy battling it out with Kamui at a tournament at Card Shop Handsome. So, instead of waiting around, Mitsusada has a cardfight with another top-class fighter: Gouki!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 男前ファイト!光定VSゴウキ

REGULAR.description:
A new country! New rules! New opponents! In the first match of the Hong Kong stage, Team Q4 has a tag team fight against brothers whose teamwork is second to none!
Source: crunchyroll

The tag team battle between Q4 and Team Lao heats up! Will Aichi and Misaki figure out how to fight as partners in time, or will they be crushed by the Dinodragons of the brothers Lao?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 最強! タッグファイト

REGULAR.description:
Kamui finally takes a turn in the Hong Kong tag team tournament. But is he really ready to face the Battle Weeds, a team that keeps coming back no matter how many times they`re stepped on?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The[ざっ]・草[そう]・魂[だましい]!!

REGULAR.description:
In the final round of the Hong Kong stage, Aichi and Kamui fight Team Aqua; then, along the way, Aichi learns about Leon`s connection to the planet Cray!
Source: crunchyroll

It`s the stunning conclusion of the Hong Kong stage, with Team Q4 in a tag team battle against Leon`s Team Dreadnought! Aichi finally uses his Psyqualia to counter the effect of Leon`s, but will he be strong enough?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 蒼嵐龍メイルストローム

REGULAR.description:
Team Q4 needs to get stronger to have any chance of winning the final stage of the circuit. Ultra-rare agrees to fight Q4, and Aichi is up first. But Kourin has her own reasons for fighting Aichi that have nothing to do with training him!
Source: crunchyroll

The battle against Ultra-rare continues! When hothead Kamui fights cucumber-cool Suiko, will he crack under pressure?! Meanwhile, Misaki`s gotten strong enough to deserve a rematch with Rekka... but Rekka`s gotten stronger, too!
Source: crunchyroll

Kyou is back, this time with a new deck that "bugs" his shanghaied opponent, Leon! And if Kyou wins, will his team replace Team Dreadnought for the final leg of the Asian Circuit...?!
Source: crunchyroll

The Japan stage begins! And its winner will go on to the final stage to fight the previous VF Circuit champions. But who are the powerful masked members of Team Unknown, the team that must also be beaten in order to proceed to the final stage...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 集結! 日本ステージ

REGULAR.description:
At the Japan stage, Kamui must once again face the bane of his existence, Nagisa... who`s set not only on winning, but on marrying Kamui!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 決戦! ブライダルファイト

REGULAR.description:
Team Unknown is finally unmasked, and while the identities of two of them will come as no surprise... the enigmatic King Z is a different story! At any rate, to actually win the final Japan stage, Team Q4 must beat X, Y, and Z!
Source: crunchyroll

In the last round of the Vanguard Fight Circuit, both Misaki and Kamui have to win their battles against Team Unknown to take the final Japan stage!
Source: crunchyroll

It`s not just a game anymore! The fate of two worlds hangs in the balance as Aichi, Kamui, and Misaki embark on a desperate mission to defeat Leon Souryu!
Source: crunchyroll

Two worlds are in peril... but before tackling that problem, Aichi chooses to fight Chris to save him from the dark side of Psyqualia!
Source: crunchyroll

It`s Kai versus Leon in limbo! Can Kai save the Earth, Cray, and the lost clans? It`s a tall order, especially since Kai doesn`t possess Psyqualia. Plus, learn the ultimate secrets of Leon and his people!
Source: crunchyroll

It`s the senses-staggering conclusion of the battle between Kai and Leon in limbo! Kai may not be backed up by the power of Void, but he`s inspired by Aichi and determined to win!
Source: crunchyroll

The penultimate episode of the Asia Circuit arc! Aichi is in heated battle with Leon, even as the pitch-black power of nothingness surrounds him!
Source: crunchyroll

In the final episode of the Asia Circuit arc, Aichi battles Leon, even as the very space around them collapses! Will Void consume two worlds as well as everything in between?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: CARDFIGHT!! ヴァンガード アジアサーキット編
卡片战斗先导者 亚洲巡回赛篇
カードファイト!! ヴァンガード アジアサーキット編
